home.title: Hi! Kami HamimArt
home.description:
kami Usaha Mikro Kecil menengah di bidang pembuatan furniture, desain interior, dan pembuatan lukisan. kami membantu pelanggan dalam merancang perabot rumah tangga yang sesuai dengan kebutuhan mereka. Rancangan kami berssifat personal jadi furniture yang dihasilkan akan menyesuaikan kebutuhan pelanggan. 

I have been specifically designed to become a digital home for designers and developers, help them build amazing professional looking websites with ease. You don't have to worry about nitty gritty of web hosting services to run a blog and yet take full advantage of CMS to manage content :)
